name: 咲耶
text: 練習もひと息ついたし、お昼でも食べに行こうか
trans:
Since we're taking a break from practice,
why don't we take the opportunity to eat lunch?

name: 結華
text: うん、そだねー
trans: Yeah, good idea～

name: 霧子
text: わたしも、いいかな……
trans: I'll tag along if it's fine...

name: 結華
text:
いやーそれにしても
この前集まった時は楽しかったよね！
trans:
But man, I gotta say,
that meetup was really fun!

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ。そうだね
ふたりがくれたお菓子も美味しかったし
trans:
Hehe, it really was.
The snacks you two brought were delicious, too.

name: 霧子
text: 行くの……遅れちゃってごめんね……
trans: We're sorry again... for being late...

name: 咲耶
text: フフ。今度また、みんなで集まればいいさ
trans: Hehe. We can plan another meetup again anyways.

name: 結華
text:
賛成～！　今度は三峰も、まみみんに頼んで
キラキラにしてもらおっと！
trans:
Agreed～! And this time around, I'll get Mamimin
to make my nails all pretty too!

name: 咲耶
text:
楽しみだな
近いうちにできたらいいんだけどね
trans:
I'm looking forward to it already.
I wonder if we could do it anytime soon.

name: 結華
text:
ほんとほんとー
さくやんはさ、次はどんな風にしてもらいたいの？
trans:
For real～!
What kind of style do you want your nails to be
this time around, Sakuyan?

name: 咲耶
text:
そうだなあ。この間もそうだったけど、
やはりキラキラしたのがいいかな
trans:
I wonder... Although it may be similar to last time,
I really do think I'd like something glittery again.

name: 結華
text:
意外と女子っぽいの好きだよねー
まみみんもちゃーんと分かってるんだろうなぁ
trans:
You like to be surprisingly girly, don't you～?
I guess Mamimin really understands you!

name: 咲耶
text: クス。そうかもしれないな
trans: Haha, that might be true.

name: 咲耶
text: ところで、霧子はどんなネイルがお好みかな？
trans: By the way, what kind of nails do you like, Kiriko?

name: 霧子
text: よく、わからない……かも
trans: I don't... really know...

name: 結華
text:
きりりんはクールな感じが似合うかもね
今度まみみんに頼んでみようよ！
trans:
I bet something cool would match you, Kiririn.
You should ask Mamimin too!

name: 咲耶
text: そうだね。私もネイルをした霧子を是非見てみたいな
trans:
That's a good idea. I'd also love to see Kiriko
with her nails done.

name: 霧子
text: ふふ……うん──
trans: Fufu... Yep──

name: 霧子
text: あ！　えっと、咲耶さん……
trans: Ah! Um, Sakuya-san...

name: 咲耶
text: ん？　どうしたんだい？
trans: Hm? What's the matter?

name: 霧子
text: ネイルが……欠けてる気がして……
trans: Your nails... look like they're chipping...

name: 結華
text: あ、ホントだ！　こまかいヒビもある！
trans: Ah, you're right! There's some small cracks, too!

name: 咲耶
text:
本当だ
レッスン前はなんともなかったんだけどな
trans:
It really is chipping...
But it wasn't like this before our lessons...

name: 結華
text:
ちょっと危なくない？
割れちゃったらタイヘンだよ～
trans:
Aren't you in a bit of a pickle?
If your nails end up damaged, it won't be pretty～

name: 咲耶
text:
ああ……残念だけど
怪我する前にネイルを落としたほうが良さそうだね
trans:
Yeah... It's a bit of a shame, but I should clean
off the polish before it gets any worse.

name: 結華
text: リムーバーあったかな？
trans: Do you have any polish remover?

name: 霧子
text:
あっ……ちょっと待ってて……
……あった……
trans:
Ah... Just a second...
...I have this...

name: 咲耶
text: 霧子？
trans: Kiriko?

name: 霧子
text:
咲耶さん……指……
こうすれば……大丈夫……
trans:
Sakuya-san...
If we wrap them... like this... it should be fine...

name: 霧子
text: 事務所で……摩美々ちゃんに……見てもらおう？
trans:
Let's go to the office... and let Mamimi-chan
have a look... okay?

name: 結華
text: まみみんなら直せそうだもんね
trans: Mamimin definitely knows how to fix this up!

name: 咲耶
text:
ありがとう、霧子、結華
私のために色々と考えてくれて
trans:
Kiriko, Yuika, thank you.
You two are doing a lot for my sake.

name: 霧子
text:
うん……あ……
もう外れかけてきてる……
trans:
No problem...
Ah... It's already coming off...

name: 咲耶
text: 本当だ、デコボコな面だから外れやすいんだね
trans:
It is... It must be hard for the bandages to stick
since the surface is so uneven.

name: 霧子
text:
ごめんね……絆創膏じゃ……
むずかしいみたい……
trans:
Sorry... It seems like...
Putting bandages on them won't work well...

name: 咲耶
text:
霧子、キミの気持ちとてもうれしかったよ
ありがとう
trans:
Kiriko, the thought is enough for me.
Thank you.

name: 咲耶
text: 霧子は本当に優しいね
trans: You really are a nice person.

name: 霧子
text:
ネイルが外れてるの見たとき
悲しそうだったから……
trans: I felt bad seeing the nails like that...

name: 霧子
text: 何とかできたらなって……
trans: So I wondered if there was anything I could do...

name: 咲耶
text:
ありがとう、霧子
残念だけど、このネイルは仕方がないよ
trans:
Thanks again, Kiriko.
It's a shame, but it seems like there's not much
else we can do.

name: 霧子
text: でも……
trans: But...

name: 咲耶
text:
大丈夫さ。ネイルが割れても
みんなで過ごした記憶までかけることはないからね
trans:
Don't worry about it. Even if it all comes off,
The memories we made at the time will always
stick with us.

name: 結華
text:
おおー、さくやん、ポジティブじゃん
王子って感じ～
trans:
Wow～ That's some positive thinking, Sakuyan!
Just like a prince～

name: 霧子
text: ……ほんとにそうだね……！
trans: ...She really is like one...!

name: 咲耶
text:
今度は、みんなでお菓子を買いに行こうか
きっと、楽しいと思うな
trans:
This time around, lets shop for snacks together.
I think that will surely be fun.

name: 結華
text:
いいねいいねー！　三峰大賛成だよー！
今日のさくやん、冴えまくりだね！
trans:
Good thinking～! Mitsumine is completely on board!
Sakuyan is really upbeat today, huh!
